Class BlinkerUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • model.BlinkerUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class BlinkerUI
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class which will control the different animations in the UI
    Author:
    Valentin
